Literature.Title: Synthesis and Evaluation of Biological Activity of Antimicrobial-Pro-Proliferative Peptide Conjugates.
Literature.Author: Kosikowska P, Pikula M, Langa P, Trzonkowski P, Obuchowski M, Lesner A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans CCM 8186(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Candida krusei CCM 8271(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis CCM 8260(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Candida tropicalis CCM 8264(MIC=7.8µg/ml),Candida glabrata CCM 8270(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Bacillus cereus(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MIC=3.9µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus PCM 2054(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli PCM 2057(MIC=7.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PCM 499(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(no activity data)
